Monitoring.VALIDATED_USING_TA_LOCATOR: Trust anchor could be validated using trust anchor locator
Monitoring.DROPPED_MORE_THEN_10_PERC: Object count has not dropped more than 10% since the last validation
Monitoring.LESS_THEN_10_PERC_VAL_ERROR: Less than 10% of objects have a validation error
Monitoring.STATISTICS: Statistics for the last validation run

Export.DESCRIPTION: Here you are able to export the complete ROA data set for use in an existing BGP decision making workflow. The output will be in CSV or JSON format and consist of all validated ROAs, minus your ignore filter entries, plus your whitelist additions.
